name: Armcade
description:
In the darkness of the near future, there is only war. Corporations command vast armies of Automatons and Wageslaves to do their bidding. Resources are becoming increasingly scarce as the ground is choked in ash and nuclear fallout. In the bombed out ruins of a once vibrant town, two assembly arms from opposing Toy-Factories become aware of each other. The companies that built them are long gone, yet the machines retain one directive: To battle it out by throwing bouncy balls at each other.

Play in online or local multiplayer in 1v1 matches and throw the best balls!

Artists:

  • Foxica
  • TranQuill

Music / Sounds:

  • Wolkenscharf
  • Ichtyozentaur (Twitch)

Coding:

  • Ugudanla
  • Schuwi (Github)
  • Ichtyozentaur
  • Wolkenscharf
